snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selections include an app in which you bank online by waving your arms and a recap of an investigation by the Federal Bureau of...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selections include an app in which you bank online by waving your arms and a recap of an investigation by the Federal Bureau of Investigation that resulted in the arrest of a man accused of being a hacker.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Don't Need an iPad, and SXSW Tips
